mapper.update: update AC_ACCOUNT_ORDER set AO_PARENT_ID = #{aoParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AO_IS_FINISH = #{aoIsFinish,jdbcType=CHAR}, AO_CREATE_TIME = #{aoCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AO_DETAIL_ID = #{aoDetailId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AO_NUMBER = #{aoNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AO_PAY_TYPE = #{aoPayType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AO_COMMODITY_NUMBER = #{aoCommodityNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AO_EFFECTIVE_TIME = #{aoEffectiveTime,jdbcType=REAL}, AO_DELIVERY_TIME = #{aoDeliveryTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AO_EXPRESS_TYPE = #{aoExpressType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AO_DEVELOP_01 = #{aoDevelop01,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ID, AO_PARENT_ID, AO_IS_FINISH, AO_CREATE_TIME, AO_DETAIL_ID, AO_NUMBER, AO_PAY_TYPE, AO_COMMODITY_NUMBER, AO_EFFECTIVE_TIME, AO_DELIVERY_TIME, AO_EXPRESS_TYPE, AO_DEVELOP_01 from AC_ACCOUNT_ORDER where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ID, AO_PARENT_ID, AO_IS_FINISH, AO_CREATE_TIME, AO_DETAIL_ID, AO_NUMBER, AO_PAY_TYPE, AO_COMMODITY_NUMBER, AO_EFFECTIVE_TIME, AO_DELIVERY_TIME, AO_EXPRESS_TYPE, AO_DEVELOP_01 from AC_ACCOUNT_ORDER
